name: alexa-statemachine
description: A fsm (state machine) framework for Alexa apps using Node.js

scripts.jscs: node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs -c .jscsrc index.js test/ lib/ samples/*/config/ samples/*/gulpfile.js samples/*/services/ samples/*/skill/ samples/*/speechAssets/ samples/*/test/ samples/*/www/
scripts.jshint: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint -c .jshintrc index.js test/ lib/ samples/*/config/ samples/*/gulpfile.js samples/*/services/ samples/*/skill/ samples/*/speechAssets/ samples/*/test/ samples/*/www/
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run jshint

author: Rain Agency <npm@rain.agency> (http://rain.agency)
